parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Supports both API Key and User Access Token authorization. See https://joyfill.mintlify.app/api/authentication

identifier.description: Specifies a document's unique ID. Maximum length is 80 characters. Identifier cannot be changed after creation. Leave the identifier param empty to have Joyfill auto generate an identifier.

name.description: Specifies the visual display name. When the template param is used in this creation event and this name is left blank the document will automatically be given the same name as the original template.

files.description: Array of JoyDoc file objects. See the JoyDoc data structure under the guides section to learn more.

fields.description: Array of JoyDoc field objects. See the JoyDoc data structure under the guides section to learn more.

template.description: The template identifier to use as the source of the document.

group.description: The group identifier of the group that you would like to create the document for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 25.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: An integer for use with pagination. For instance, if limit is set to 25 and you set page to 2 then results 26-50 will be returned.

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Specifies an original source template identifier to filter documents.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Filter documents by a specific group identifier. Only documents that belong to the specified group will be returned.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Supports both API Key and User Access Token authorization. See https://joyfill.mintlify.app/api/authentication

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Limit the data returned as a part of the response by specifying the desired properties ( ["name", "stage", "files"] )

parameters.description: Supports both API Key and User Access Token authorization. See https://joyfill.mintlify.app/api/authentication

data.description: Array of raw Document objects or Document from template objects. Max 100 documents can be created at a time.

fields.description: Array of JoyDoc field objects. See the JoyDoc data structure under the guides section to learn more.

group.description: The group identifier of the group that you would like to create the document for.

limit.description: The number of template documents to update with this request.

page.description: An integer for use with update pagination. For instance, if limit is set to 25 and you set page to 2 then results 26-50 will be updated.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Supports both API Key and User Access Token authorization. See https://joyfill.mintlify.app/api/authentication

identifier.description: Specifies a group's unique ID. Maximum length is 80 characters.  * Don't use personally identifiable information (PII) such as the user's email address, legal name, or phone number. Identifier cannot be changed after creation. Leave the identifier param empty to have Joyfill auto generate an identifier.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 25.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: An integer for use with pagination. For instance, if limit is set to 25 and you set page to 2 then results 26-50 will be returned.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Supports both API Key and User Access Token authorization. See https://joyfill.mintlify.app/api/authentication

identifier.description: Specifies a user's unique ID. Maximum length is 80 characters.  * Don't use personally identifiable information (PII) such as the user's email address, legal name, or phone number. Identifier cannot be changed after creation. Leave the identifier param empty to have Joyfill auto generate an identifier.

group.description: The identifier of the group you want to add the user to. If no group exists with the specified identifier then one will automatically be created.

issueAccessToken.description: Determines whether to create an access token for the user. If set to true, an access token will be generated and returned in the token field. This token can be used in API request instead of API Keys.

accessTokenExpiration.description: Millisecond timestamp of token expiration date. Expired tokens will not be able to make API requests. Leave blank to issue an access token that never expires.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 25.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: An integer for use with pagination. For instance, if limit is set to 25 and you set page to 2 then results 26-50 will be returned.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of users you want to return. See the users Overview page for more information about user types.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Filter users by a specific group identifier. Only users that belong to the specified group will be returned.

parameters.description: Supports both API Key and User Access Token authorization. See https://joyfill.mintlify.app/api/authentication

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier of the user that you want to issue the access token for. User identifier can be found on the Joyfill User on the `user.identifier` property.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Supports both API Key and User Access Token authorization. See https://joyfill.mintlify.app/api/authentication

accessTokenExpiration.description: Optional. Millisecond timestamp of token expiration date. Expired tokens will not be able to make API requests. Leave blank to issue an access token that never expires.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 25.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: An integer for use with pagination. For instance, if limit is set to 25 and you set page to 2 then results 26-50 will be returned.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Specifies the unique ID of the user you want to retrieve the access tokens for.

parameters.description: Supports both API Key and User Access Token authorization. See https://joyfill.mintlify.app/api/authentication
